name: alderney
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an island in the English Channel. It is the third largest of the group of islands known as the Channel Islands: The most northerly of the Channel Islands, Alderney is only three square miles in area.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Scilly bee is a distinct sub-species found only in the Isles of Scilly and the Channel Island of Alderney.He built luxury hotels in Guernsey and Alderney. It is perfectly legal for British citizens to contact an offshore bookie in places such as Gibraltar, Alderney and the Isle of Man to place a bet tax-free.In occupied Guernsey, Jersey, Alderney and Sark, there was one German soldier for every three islanders.
